entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Drayton Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:51 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
